So-called “right-to-work” laws have 1 goal: to gut unions & stop workers from fighting for better wages & benefits. I’m glad to work with @BradSherman on a bill to ban state “right-to-work” laws & protect workers’ right to join a union. https://www.warren.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/senator-warren-and-rep-sherman-announce-the-nationwide-right-to-unionize-act

Medicare for All will save tens of thousands of lives every year. In the United States of America, when a person is sick, that person should be able to access health care and see a doctor. When a person goes to the hospital, that person should not end up in bankruptcy.

There’s a long history in the US of abusing scripture to advance the causes of bigotry & discrimination.

Slaveholders did it.
Segregationists did it.
White supremacists do it.
And it continues.

Yet if Christ repeated himself today, they’d likely denounce him as a radical, too. https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1233395932072480768 QT @nowthisnews 'The only time religious freedom is invoked is in the name of bigotry and discrimination. On the last day of #BlackHistoryMonth, I'm thinking about the unsung heroes whose shoulders we stand on in the fight for justice and equality.

These are countless Black Americans whose names we do not know but who fought for what was right, unburdened by what has been.

RT @RepSeanMaloney My husband & I have been raising kids for 27 years. Our eldest came to us when he was almost 3. His mom OD’d & his dad went to jail. There was no one to take care of this little boy, so we did. When you discriminate against LGBTQ couples, you deprive kids like mine of good homes. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ER0GgXlWsAIohg6.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1233147392083550209/vid/320x320/LfGMA-Y-dcysO2Zh.mp4?tag=13

I am proud to have stood with working people to stop efforts to cut and privatize Social Security over the years.

Social Security is the most successful government program in our nation's history.

Our job is to protect it and expand it. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ER9ww4CUEAExLEJ.png https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1233815417883328512/vid/320x352/gP3fBTfGo62on3Jf.mp4?tag=13

As @berniesanders praises Fidel Castro, I challenge Bernie to listen to my aunt’s powerful personal story—she was imprisoned & tortured by Castro—look her in the eyes & tell her Castro was not a monster. Watch for yourself: https://youtu.be/ytVWMF-_SiI

RT @Cocofritz .@tedcruz talks w/his own Tia Sonia who lived under socialist communist dictator Fidel Castro as a girl. What Comrade Bernie paints as "utopic" sounds EXACTLY like Castro! Everybody was the same, but EVERYBODY was poor, hungry & miserable. LISTEN! #Verdict

You now need to compete against somebody in China who makes $1.50/hour.

If you don’t like it, we are going to move our plant to China.

Do we think that is right? I don’t.

I'm proud to be your partner in this fight for teachers, students, high-quality public education, and to protect and empower the voices of unions. https://twitter.com/rweingarten/status/1233895893973291010 QT @rweingarten Here's why I personally support @ewarren. Many @aftunion members & others have asked me who I personally support. Now building on the @AFTunion Reso encouraging our members to help Joe, Bernie and/ or Elizabeth, here's why I am with @ewarren. #AFTvotes https://aftvoices.org/why-im-supporting-elizabeth-warren-cd30e7f6d53f

Tonight, I’ll take the stage in Houston to speak about the threats we face today. With a public health and economic crisis looming, we need a president whose core values can be trusted, who has a plan for how to govern, and who can actually get it done. I will be that president.

In 2009, the federal minimum wage was set at $7.25/hour.

More than 10 years later and it’s still $7.25. We need a $15 minimum wage to be the national floor. Now.

I want to congratulate Joe Biden on his victory tonight.

I believe very strongly that the people of this country—on Super Tuesday and after—will support us because we are more than a campaign. We are a movement.
